snippet: The Islanders said they would use a compliance buyout for the goaltender and former first overall draft pick Rick DiPietro, concluding an expensive saga.
abstract: New York Islanders will use compliance buyout for goaltender Rick DiPietro, who struggled to live up to high expectations in a career continually interrupted by injuries.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders said they would use a compliance buyout for the goaltender and former first overall draft pick Rick DiPietro, concluding an expensive saga.
